beschreibung: Delicious deviled eggs with a creamy yolk filling, seasoned with mustard and mayonnaise.
zubereitung: Boil eggs until hard (about 10 minutes), cool in cold water, and peel.
Cut eggs in half and remove the yolks.
Mix the yolks with mayonnaise, mustard, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Fill the mixture into the egg halves.
Sprinkle with paprika powder and serve.
